entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 07:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: WSW 47 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to flurries this morning. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
